goal.creation_repartition_global:
üí° Using this distribution method, the annual total objective will be automatically distributed over the number of {0} remaining in the current year and divided by the number of participants selected.
 Once validated, you will be able to customize the individual objectives assigned to all of your teams.
goal.creation_repartition_global_team:
üí° Using this distribution method, the annual overall objective will be automatically divided by the number of {0} remaining in the current year and distributed proportionally according to the number of participants present in the selected teams.
 Once validated, you will be able to customize the objectives assigned to all the teams.
goal.creation_repartition_individual:
üí° Using this distribution method, the individual objective will be automatically assigned to all selected participants out of the {0} remaining in the current year.
 Once validated, you will be able to customize the individual objectives assigned to all of your teams.
goal.creation_repartition_individual_team:
üí° Using this distribution method, the team objective will be automatically assigned to all the selected teams out of the {0} remaining of the current year.
 Once validated, you will be able to customize the objectives assigned to all the teams.
